def main():
    N = int(input())
    T = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    M = int(input())
    P = []
    X = []
    for i in range(M):
        p, x = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
        P.append(p)
        X.append(x)

    for i in range(M):
        t = sum(T) - T[P[i]-1] + X[i]
        print(t)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
